description: Multi-factor authentication requires two or more verification methods
example: Something you know (password), something you have (token), something you are (biometric)

description: Role-based access control assigns permissions based on roles
example: Admin role can modify system settings, User role can only view content

description: Uses the same key for encryption and decryption
Monitors and filters incoming and outgoing network traffic
example: Stateful firewall keeps track of active connections, Stateless firewall filters based on rules
